newsitem.title: JAPAN: Keisei sets terms on straight bond.
newsitem.headline: Keisei sets terms on straight bond.

text.p: BORROWER - Keisei Electric Railway Co Ltd
LEAD MGR - Nomura Securities Co Ltd
TYPE straight bond ISSUE NO 30 AMT 15 bln yen
LAST MOODY'S PAY DATE 19.Mar.97 INT PAY 19th Mar/Sep
LAST S&P SIGN DATE SUB DATE 25.Feb
